Class BankManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.tees.gold.L1087591.ShareWatcher

  • public class BankManager
extends ShareWatcher
    BankManager.java represents a stock broker who invests in company X.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankManager

        public BankManager(double buy,
           double sell,
           int increment)
        Builds a new BankManager object, initializing all fields.
        Parameters:
        buy - The bank manager will buy shares below this price.
        sell - The bank manager will sell shares above this price.
        increment - The bank manager will buy this many share when the price is right.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePrice

        public void updatePrice(double price)
        Description copied from class: ShareWatcher
        This method is called when the price of a share in company X changes. When it is called, all registered watchers are updated with the new price of the share. At that time they can make buy/sell decisions.
        Specified by:
        updatePrice in class ShareWatcher
        Parameters:
        price - The new price of the share, in pounds and pence.
